__e: A creature that's been alive for 3,000 years is in this town... and it's brought death with it.
So why don't you trundle along to your little town, safe in the knowledge that, if I ever see you here again, I'll kill you.
Robert has a girl back home... and he just told me he's going to be a father.
I understand he drops into this town occasionally.
In a town that makes me want to die.
We need to bring everyone from the settlement back to the base.
